content.question: A graph of which of the following quantities would result in a straight line with a slope that could be used to determine the acceleration due to gravity <math alttext="g" overflow="scroll"> <mi>g</mi> </math> at Earthâ€™s surface?

choices.label: <math alttext="T" overflow="scroll"><mi>T</mi></math> as a function of <math alttext="l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="l squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T" overflow="scroll"><mi>T</mi></math> as a function of <math alttext="l squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="T squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="script">l</mi></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
